item.description:
Dear evolved individual,

How are you?

May this message find you in good health and a happy peaceful mind.

 

I was a little busy in August, so this will be the makeup meetup for August. Last month, thank for your support that we discussed the meditation which everyone have their own way to practice. In the end we all toward to the enlightenment stage of life. Life is a continently evolving.  We all participated in this journey, some are enlighten and some are in the process of enlighten.

 

This additional meetup, we would like to hear more about meditation. It will be richer in sharing. It seems we already have one more month to practice in life. Share what you know with us or just simple be opened mind to learn from others.

 

Look forward to seeing you all and let’s send out a peaceful energy to the world.

 

     Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: When you drive into condos, the second building on your right. park any place with visit parking sign on it. Door bell #19
item.name: Westborough Spiritual August (make-up) Meetup about Meditation
